mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Senator John Davison (Jay) Rockefeller IV Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Photograph of Senator Rockefeller with the two West Virginia delegates of the United States Senate Youth Program
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Senate Photographic Studio
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Senator John D. (Jay) Rockefeller poses with the 1985 United States Senate Youth Program delegates from West Virginia. Created in 1962 by Senate Resolution 324, the annual program gives two high school students from each state the opportunity to participate in a week-long immersive experience in Washington, D.C. that focuses on public service, leadership, and learning about the interrelated components of the federal government.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Rockefeller, John D, IV (John Davison), 1937
United States Senate Youth Program
digital images
mdRecord.dcterms:source: Senator John D. (Jay) Rockefeller IV papers, West Virginia & Regional History Center, West Virginia University Libraries
